title: Sampler, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross, stem eye and satin stitches on plain weave foundation
signed: "Hannah Wedgwood's Sampler wrought in the 12 year of her age."
inscribed: "Hannah Wedgwood's Sampler wrought in the 12 year of her age."
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Curving band of pattern three alphabets, and one set of numerals with the inscription "Hannah Wedgwood's Sampler wrought in the 12 year of her age."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross, stem eye and satin stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-23.
